attributes.additional_details: There has been many car crashes, pedestrian hit by car. There is a four way traffic system  between shops, parks, schools, church and local access, but no pedestrian crossing it’s dangerous we’re ever you have to cross but more dangerous to cross at the lights. Many cars speed and go through red lights, the longer this takes the more chance of a serious or fatal accident
attributes.background: Put pedestrian crossing on junction and put speed cameras up on the junction

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
